title: Sultans of swing: the very best of Dire Straits
creator_credit: Marghie Evans and PolyGram Video International
brief_description: ‘Sultans of swing’ features 16 of Dire Strait’s most popular songs including: “Sultans of swing”, “Lady writer”, “Romeo and Juliet”, “Tunnel of love”, “Private investigations”, “Twisting by the pool”, “Love over gold (live)”, “So far away”, “Money for nothing”, “Brothers in arms”, “Walk of life”, “Calling Elvis”, “Heavy fuel”, “On every street”, “Your latest trick (live)” and “Local hero - wild theme (live)”.
